Description:
Welcome to Epping's Best!
This spacious double storey home built to the highest standards, Perfectly positioned in the top spot in Epping where safety and family values are first choice. Offers a great entertaining life style within walking distance to the Aurora Shopping Centre, Lyndarum Town Centre and schools plus a short drive to the Epping Train Station.
From the moment you walk in, you'll be impressed by the the wide entry and free flowing floor plan. Features two master bedrooms, mulitple living zones, modern kitchen includes wide stainless steel appliances, walk in pantry, dishwasher & stone bench top which is open to large meals and family areas. Downstairs features a master bedroom with ensuite and huge alfresco/outdoor entertaining area with beautiful landscaped gardens highlights the home's practicality & functionality for everyday family living
Making your way upstairs you'll find another master bedroom with full ensuite with a spa bath, built in robe and also a walk in robe for all of your fashion accessories. In addition to all this, you also have two more bedrooms upstairs with walk in robes serviced by a central bathroom, family retreat and a theatre room to enjoy.
Extra's include: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, roman blinds, downlights, powder room, double remote garage, side access gate is perfect for another vehicle/boat, ducted vacuum, tiled garage, spacious laundry, ample storage throughout the house, alarm, video intercom and the list goes on!
A golden opportunity to buy a grand family entertainer in a premier locale, Be quick to inspect before it's gone. MUST BE SOLD!

Description:
GREAT FIRST-HOME WITH THREE BEDROOMS IN AN EXCELLENT LOCATION
Set on a compact block of 318m2 approx., this is a perfect place for the down-sizer, first home buyer or a buyer looking for a low-maintenance home and garden.
With three good sized bedrooms all with robes - master has a walk-n robe and ensuite bathroom - there is plenty of accommodation for the whole family.
The main living area is light filled and it is a good size for a lounge and other furniture.
The kitchen-meals area has plenty of room for a good sized dining table and enough storage for your weekly shop at the supermarket.
The adjoining covered alfresco area is large and would be a great area to entertain or for the kids to play under cover.
The two car garage is a real asset and it also has side access, being a corner block.
Other features include ducted gas heating, split-system air-conditioning, solar-panels, an alarm system and roller shutters.
The house is close to Westfield Shopping Centre, schools including Mill Park Secondary College, medical facilities, and just around the corner form the Lakes Reserve.
And it is close to South Morang railway station, making it ideal to commute to the city.
Epping is one of the few parts of Melbourne where the lifestyle is relaxed, has excellent facilities has a community feel and still has affordable homes.

EXCELLENT FOUR BEDROOM HOME IN A GREAT COURT LOCATION
